metadata.title: CVE-2022-2806 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
It was found that the ovirt-log-collector/sosreport collects the RHV adminpassword unfiltered. Fixed in: sos-4.2-20.el8_6,ovirt-log-collector-4.4.7-2.el8ev

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sosreport - 4.3-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sosreport package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3-1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
